title: MPfree: Korea In The Space â€“ Velvet Hands
content:
This psychedelic lo-fi number comes courtesy of the elusive and bizarrely named Korea In The Space.

With the summer weather seemingly well and truly behind us, let Velvet Hands transport your consciousness to a tranquil, sandy beach, complete with somnolent palm trees and the imperceptible hum of the harmonious ocean. Reverb laden vocals, reminiscent of Panda Bear dominant the antecedent section of the track, whilst midway through the vocals fade out and the addictive guitar-drum combo takes the wheel. Stream and download Velvet Hands below, and oh, if you happen across any more information on this enigmatic artist, then let us know!
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
